shortdesc.ph: Gets the C++ handle of the Native SDK.
Gets the C++ handle of the Native SDK.

Gets the C++ handle of the Native SDK.

p.codeblock: public abstract int GetNativeHandler(ref IntPtr nativeHandler);

section.p: This method gets the C++ handle of the Native SDK engine, used in special scenarios such as registering audio and video callbacks.
This method gets the C++ handle of the Native SDK engine, used in special scenarios such as registering audio and video callbacks.
This method gets the C++ handle of the Native SDK engine, which is used in special scenarios including registering audio and video callbacks.
This method gets the C++ handle of the Native SDK engine, used in special scenarios including registering audio and video callbacks.

plentry.pd: An output parameter. The native handle of the SDK engine.

section.title: Return Values
section.p: The Native handle of the SDK engine.
The Native handle of the SDK engine.
Native handle of the SDK engine.

ul.li: < 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
